bios.name: Andrew Freeman
bios.bio: Andrew co-founded the company in 2000 and is responsible for the strategic direction of the business as well as maintaining close relationships with clients to ensure successful programme delivery.  He leads CRMT with a clear purpose to align clients’ sales and marketing processes to drive business revenue.

bios.name: Tony Sprague
bios.bio: Tony co-founded the company with Andrew in 2000. An executive-level technical specialist with substantial experience in Marketing Automation, CRM and business process management, Tony is a trusted advisor to all CRMT’s clients.

bios.name: Alison Saunders
bios.bio: Alison Saunders manages our internal client teams and is responsible for developing and maintaining successful relationships with customers and prospects. She is highly experienced in marketing strategy and planning, so is ideally positioned to understand and advise on the many complex requirements and challenges our clients face.
